Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47108 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.10-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-47108 affecting package kube-vip-cloud-provider for versions less than 0.0.10-1. A patched version of the package is available.
